a rare disorder; it has been reported in about 60 people worldwide. This condition occurs almost exclusively in females.,GHR,congenital hemidysplasia with ichthyosiform erythroderma and limb defects
What are the genetic changes related to congenital hemidysplasia with ichthyosiform erythroderma and limb defects ?,"Mutations in the NSDHL gene cause CHILD syndrome. This gene provides instructions for making an enzyme that is involved in the production of cholesterol. Cholesterol is a type of fat
